meanings.def: the science of numbers and shapes. Branches of mathematics include arithmetic, algebra, geometry and trigonometry.
examples: Both science and mathematics show us that the universe has not been around for an infinite duration of time.
Galileo was appointed professor of mathematics at the University of Padua.
There is a whole field of applied mathematics which is eminently practical.
Astronomy in this mould becomes a branch of pure mathematics.

meanings.def: the process of calculating using numbers
examples: He worked out the very difficult mathematics in great detail.
Her proof is a remarkable piece of mathematics.

related: science, technology, engineering, arts and mathematics
